key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities impacting production and revenue
Regulatory challenges delaying product launches and market access
Post-merger integration risks affecting efficiency and profitability
Revenue volatility due to post-pandemic declines in testing demand
Competitive pressure from major players in the diagnostics market
Leadership instability and strategic shifts raising concerns
controversies: Sale of over 8 million shares by Carlyle Group raising concerns about leadership stability
social_issues: Corporate governance challenges due to leadership changes and activist investor interest
governance_issues: Potential governance challenges from activist investor interest
